name: Ha
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to the one who holds the key to my heart! On this special day, I want to shower you with endless love and wishes for a year filled with joy, laughter, and unforgettable moments. You are the light that brightens my world, and I am incredibly grateful for the love we share.... May this day be filled with laughter, love, and sweet surprises. Thank you for being an incredible partner, for accepting me just as I am, and for loving me with all your heart. Here's to many more birthdays together, growing in love and creating a future filled with happiness.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
